ActionPlanTemplateItem.name: ActionPlanTemplateItem
ActionPlanTemplateItem.description: Represents the instance of an item on an action plan template version.

ActionPlanTemplateVersionId.description: The version of the action plan template this item is for.

DisplayOrder.description: The order in which this item is displayed within the action plan template version.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the task created from this template item is active. The default value is false.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether this action plan template item is locked or not. The default value is false.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the task created from this template item is required. The default value is false.

ItemEntityType.description: The type of action plan template item entity..

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether this action plan template item can be edited or not. The default value is false.

Name.description: The unique identifier for this action plan template item record.

UniqueName.description: The unique name for this action plan template item. This field is unique within your organization.
